instructions: Open the Breathe app on your Apple Watch. Turn the Digital Crown to increase the duration. You can choose a time between one and five minutes. To set this as your default duration, open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, tap Breathe, then turn on Use Previous Duration.
Open the Health app on your iPhone. Tap Health Data, then tap Heart. Swipe left on heart rate to see Breathe.
